idea-plugin.name: ayu Dark Scheme All-Round
idea-plugin.description:
ayu Dark Schome All-Round

a complete ayu Dark color scheme plugin for all of your favorite languages!

100% coverage of bundled languages of following IDEs:

  • IntelliJ IDEA 2022.1.3
  • Android Studio 2021.2.1
  • PyCharm 2022.1.3
  • WebStorm 2022.1.3
  • Rider 2022.1.2
  • GoLand 2022.1.3

More Information on:

https://github.com/qyurila/ayu-dark-jetbrains
